value: Write a programme to generate and print a dictionary that contains a number (between 1 and n) in the form (x, x*x).

title: solution
value:
var prompt = require('readline-sync');
var n = prompt.questionInt('How many more times? ');
d = {}
for (let i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
d[i] = i ** 2
}
console.log(d);
